text: ennal bahudaiva visvasikalilninn ninnalumayi ‎kararilerppetukayum pinne at palikkunnatil vilca ‎varuttatirikkukayum ninnalkkenatire areyum ‎sahayikkatirikkukayum ceytavarkk itu badhakamalla. avareatulla ‎karar avayute kalavadhivare ninnal palikkuka. tirccyayum ‎allahu suksmata pulartturannavareyan istappetunnat. ‎
